mapper.sql: scr.id, scr.client_id, scr.item_id, scr.score, scr.create_time, scr.modify_time, scr.record_id, scr.general_score, scr.item_level_id
mapper.insert:
insert into spa_check_result
id,
client_id,
item_id,
score,
create_time,
modify_time,
record_id,
general_score,

mapper.update:
update spa_check_result
client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update spa_check_result set client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from spa_check_result scr inner join spa_client sc on sc.id=scr.client_id inner join spa_check_item sci on sci.id=scr.item_id
